teaser: Airing on Friday, May 29, 2015: With news of the indictment of a former speaker of the House, one key term to know is "structuring." More on that. Next: venture capital for drones is about to hit an all-time high. We look at what’s behind the abundance of funding in such a specific corner of the tech industry. Plus, we'll talk about technology in the classroom and what happens when you give a kid a laptop.
